revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Artila |model=Matrix 504-64 |revision=V03 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=PloTech |manuf_model=11763-TB |manuf_rev=-6009 |availability=currently shipping |est_release_date=09/2009 |type=IoT hub |pwr_v=9-48 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=terminal block |cpu1_brand=Atmel |cpu1_model=AT91SAM9G20 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0C-PCB0 |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Atmel |fla2_model=AT45DB161D |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3V56S40ETP-G6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |serial=yes,, RJ-45 console,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Davicom |eth_chip2_model=DM9161AEP |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=RS-232 Transciever;Sipex;SP3232EC;;1;,,, RS-232 Level Converter;Sipex;SP3243E;;4;,,, 3.3V RS-485/RS-422 Transceiver;SP3075E;;5;,,, Serial I2C RTC w/Battery Switchover;STMicro;M41T82;;1;,,, 1A Step-Down Switching Regulator;National Semi;LM5010;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;Richteck;RT9164A;;1;,,, 400V Glass Passivated Bridge Rectifier;Multicomp Pro;DB104S;;1;,, |flags=RTC w/ battery, RS232, RS485, buzzer, metal case |default_ip=192.168.2.127 |default_user=root |default_pass=root |oui_eth=00:13:48 }} {{TagLine|Artila MATRIX 504 Industrial Linux Computer}} :[https://www.artila.com/en/p_matrix.html Product page] "MATRIX 504 V03" silkscreened on top of board. ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Atmel]] AT91SAM9G20 @400MHz *Storage: 2MB Serial Flash, 128MB NAND *Memory: 64MB SDRAM *Network: 1x FE port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 Host, 1x USB Device *Serial: 2x RS232/RS485/RS422, 2x RS232/RS485 *Power: 9-48V via terminal block ==Images== File:Artila Matrix 504 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Artila Matrix 504 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
